name: rexlimi
params: setvar s0, class c0, wff w0, wff w1

stmt.origin: mpbi(wi(wrex(s0, c0, w0), w1), wral(s0, c0, wi(w0, w1)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wrex(s0, c0, w0), w1)
-| wral(s0, c0, wi(w0, w1))
-| wb(wral(s0, c0, wi(w0, w1)), wi(wrex(s0, c0, w0), w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wrex(s0, c0, w0), w1)
-| wral(s0, c0, wi(w0, w1))
-| wb(wral(s0, c0, wi(w0, w1)), wi(wrex(s0, c0, w0), w1))

body.origin:
|- wral(s0, c0, wi(w0, w1))
-| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wi(w0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wrex(s0, c0, w0), w1)
-| wb(wral(s0, c0, wi(w0, w1)), wi(wrex(s0, c0, w0), w1))
-| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wi(w0, w1))

body.origin:
|- wb(wral(s0, c0, wi(w0, w1)), wi(wrex(s0, c0, w0), w1))
-| wnf(s0, w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wrex(s0, c0, w0), w1)
-| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wi(w0, w1))
-| wnf(s0, w1)

comment: Restricted quantifier version of ~ exlimi . (Contributed by NM, 30-Nov-2003.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 30-May-2011.)
